channel.title: Webclient
channel.description: How can I make a webclient/jar from this client? Main class is Gui. The cache is already in the client. Pic : [img]http://i.imgur.com/akeKxtK.png[/img]

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“yvesdv, post:6, topic:536990”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=655805.msg4389678#msg4389678 date=1387039474]

The main class will always be client when you make a webclient. You can change the loader from Gui to client in the run.bat by editing it and changing the word “Gui” to client.

Also, you need to make sure your cache is loading from a location basically everyone has, like the C:/ Drive or user.home.

Lastly, wrong section.

How do I make the cache load in the C:/ drive?

Change the location in Signlink.java, it should be under findcachedir, and make sure that all files that load in the cache are loading from signlink.findcachedir()
[/quote]
Is it possible that you can show it to me through Teamviewer? I would appreciate it alot[/quote]
There is millions of tutorials on specifically this… I don’t honestly think I need to.

Read full topic

The main class will always be client when you make a webclient. You can change the loader from Gui to client in the run.bat by editing it and changing the word “Gui” to client.

Also, you need to make sure your cache is loading from a location basically everyone has, like the C:/ Drive or user.home.

Lastly, wrong section.

How do I make the cache load in the C:/ drive?
[/quote]
Change the location in Signlink.java, it should be under findcachedir, and make sure that all files that load in the cache are loading from signlink.findcachedir()[/quote]
Is it possible that you can show it to me through Teamviewer? I would appreciate it alot

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“yvesdv, post:4, topic:536990”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=655805.msg4389656#msg4389656 date=1387035103]
The main class will always be client when you make a webclient. You can change the loader from Gui to client in the run.bat by editing it and changing the word “Gui” to client.

Also, you need to make sure your cache is loading from a location basically everyone has, like the C:/ Drive or user.home.

Lastly, wrong section.
[/quote]
How do I make the cache load in the C:/ drive?[/quote]
Change the location in Signlink.java, it should be under findcachedir, and make sure that all files that load in the cache are loading from signlink.findcachedir()

Read full topic
